Shino manipulates his [[kikaichū]] to form a giant pillar that collapses into a wave that engulfs the opponent. The bugs then turn into a whirlpool that drag the opponent below ground before spouting out as a pillar that implodes.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|"Shoku"|蝕}} can mean both "meal" and "eclipse". However, "meal" is usually written as "食".

[[pl:Kikaichū: Shoku]]
